name: Sho Tsugawa
content: Sho Tsugawa's Homepage:Top Sho Tsugawa's Homepage:Top TOP Profile Publication Research Lecture Links Profile Sho Tsugawa received the M.E. and Ph.D. degrees from Osaka University, Japan, in 2009 and 2012, respectively. He is currently an associate professor at the Institute of Systems and Information Engineering, University of Tsukuba, Japan. From 2012 to 2013, he was an assistant professor at the Graduate School of Economics, Osaka University, Japan. From 2013 to 2022, he was an assistant professor at the Institute of Systems and Information Engineering, University of Tsukuba, Japan. His research interests include network science, and computational social science. Contact Institute of Systems and Information Engineering, University of Tsukuba 1-1-1 Tennodai, Tsukuba, Ibaraki 305-8573, Japan Email:s-tugawa[atmark]cs.tsukuba.ac.jp 著者: Sho Tsugawa Created: 2023-03-07 ç« 17:13 Validate
